name: Gooey Character Creator
description:
Your blob friend hasn't been feeling well in quarantine but now they're going back to (virtual) school. Help them find a look!

This is just a simple little GUI character creator I made for my intro to programming class that I ended up liking a lot. It has limited options for now, but I will probably update from time to time!

Special thank you to Starry for making outfit options!! <3


Programming -

Code: Thi Relf (teamoriart)

Instruction: Janelle Baxter
